text: [Ej ummati Muhammad] Şumo ʙehtarin ummate hasted, ki ʙaroi mardum padidor şudaed: Ba kori nek farmon medihed va az kori nopisand ʙozmedored va ʙa Alloh taolo imon dored; va agar ahli kitoʙ [niz] imon meovardand, hatman, ʙarojaşon ʙehtar ʙud; ʙarxe az onon mu'minand va [ammo] ʙeştaraşon [fosiqu] nofarmonand
